message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $13,000.  I believe it represents a fantastic deal given its value and potential. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand your position, but $13,000 is already a significant reduction from my initial asking price.  Could you meet me halfway at $11,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I still can't go above $10,000 for the product. I hope we can find a middle ground.
